alert.note: Alert for Cowlitz (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 06 at 1:32AM PST until December 06 at 6:06PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Washington... Cowlitz River at Kelso affecting Cowlitz County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cowlitz River at Kelso. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 21.5 feet, flooding of several low lying and secondary roads begins, including the Cowlitz Gardens neighborhood, along with flooding of pasture and lowland upstream of Kelso. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:21 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 21.6 feet this morning before steadily lowering Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 115 PM PST.
